[00:00.00]All The Stars - Kendrick Lamar (肯德里克·拉马尔)/SZA
[00:06.66]Lyrics by：Kendrick Lamar/S. Rowe/M. Spears/Al Shux
[00:13.33]Composed by：Kendrick Lamar/S. Rowe/M. Spears/Al Shux
[00:20.00]Kendrick Lamar：
[00:20.36]Love let's talk about love
[00:23.53]
[00:24.52]Is it anything and everything you hoped for
[00:28.45]
[00:29.17]I get a feeling on you
[00:31.09]
[00:34.12]I get a feeling on you
[00:35.94]
[00:36.66]SZA：
[00:37.70]
[00:39.48]This may be the night that my dreams might let me know
[00:42.70]All the stars are closer all the stars are closer all the stars are closer
[00:49.47]This may be the night that my dreams might let me know
[00:52.31]All the stars are closer all the stars are closer all the stars are closer
[00:58.79]Kendrick Lamar：
[00:58.89]Tell me what you gon' do to me
[01:00.53]
[01:01.37]Confrontation ain't nothin' new to me
[01:02.91]
[01:04.47]You can bring a bullet bring a sword
[01:05.79]Bring a morgue but you can't bring the truth to me
[01:07.93]
[01:09.19]You and all your expectations
[01:10.79]
[01:11.30]I don't even want your congratulations
[01:13.16]
[01:13.77]I recognize you far as confidence and
[01:15.30]Calculated promises all in your conversation
[01:18.16]
[01:18.82]I hate people that feel entitled
[01:20.62]
[01:21.15]Look at me crazy 'cause I ain't invite you
[01:23.51]Oh you important
[01:24.29]You the moral to the story you endorsing
[01:26.06]Motherf**ker I don't even like you
[01:28.13]
[01:28.71]Corrupted man's heart with a gift
[01:30.28]
[01:31.06]That's how you find out who you dealin' with
[01:32.57]
[01:33.61]A small percentage who I'm building with
[01:35.13]
[01:36.05]I want the credit if I'm losing or I'm winning
[01:37.90]On my momma that's the realest sh*t
[01:39.68]Love let's talk about love
[01:42.83]
[01:43.75]Is it anything and everything you hoped for
[01:47.67]
[01:48.49]I get a feeling on you
[01:50.63]
[01:53.47]I get a feeling on you
[01:55.18]
[01:56.33]SZA：
[01:58.65]This may be the night that my dreams might let me know
[02:01.93]All the stars are closer all the stars are closer all the stars are closer
[02:08.48]This may be the night that my dreams might let me know
[02:11.81]All the stars are closer all the stars are closer all the stars are closer
[02:19.06]Skin covered with an ego
[02:21.33]Get to talking like a end-forth like a rebound
[02:25.01]
[02:25.66]No control no off switch in the way that you bringing me down
[02:30.59]It's a turn on get it away from me
[02:32.91]Know you mean wrong keep away from me
[02:35.60]And it's all wrong get it away from me yeah
[02:39.01]
[02:39.74]I just cry for no reason I just pray for no reason
[02:44.80]I just thank for the life for the day
[02:46.87]For the hours and another life breathin'
[02:49.67]How did it all go to feel good
[02:51.86]You could live it all if you feel bad
[02:54.86]Better live your life
[02:56.85]We were running out of time
[02:59.04]
[02:59.80]Both：
[03:00.17]Love let's talk about love
[03:02.65]Is it anything and everything you hoped for
[03:04.78]I get a feeling on you
[03:06.13]
[03:09.94]I get a feeling on you
[03:13.84]SZA：
[03:14.49]
[03:18.03]This may be the night that my dreams might let me know
[03:21.05]All the stars are closer all the stars are closer all the stars are closer
[03:27.88]This may be the night that my dreams might let me know
[03:30.98]All the stars are closer all the stars are closer all the stars are closer
data.trans:
[ti:All The Stars]
[ar:Kendrick Lamar/SZA]
[al:All The Stars]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.66]//
[00:13.33]//
[00:20.00]//
[00:20.36]爱情 让我们来谈谈爱情
[00:23.53]
[00:24.52]这是你唯一渴望的事情吗
[00:28.45]
[00:29.17]我对你很有感觉
[00:31.09]
[00:34.12]我对你很有感觉
[00:35.94]
[00:36.66]//
[00:37.70]
[00:39.48]也许是这个夜晚 我的梦境让我知道
[00:42.70]满天繁星向我越靠越近 满天繁星向我越靠越近
[00:49.47]也许是这个夜晚 我的梦境让我知道
[00:52.31]满天繁星向我越靠越近 满天繁星向我越靠越近
[00:58.79]//
[00:58.89]告诉我你会对我做些什么
[01:00.53]
[01:01.37]对我来说 纷争已是家常便饭
[01:02.91]
[01:04.47]你可以将我置于枪林弹雨之中
[01:05.79]将我置于死地 但你无法为我带来真相
[01:07.93]
[01:09.19]不要再对我有任何期望
[01:10.79]
[01:11.30]我根本不稀罕你的祝福
[01:13.16]
[01:13.77]我知道你盲目的自信
[01:15.30]还有工于心计的诺言
[01:18.16]
[01:18.82]我讨厌自我标榜的人
[01:20.62]
[01:21.15]你以为我疯了 因为我没有邀请你
[01:23.51]你算个什么东西
[01:24.29]你只是为了教育世人的反面典型 承认吧
[01:26.06]混蛋 我真的不喜欢你
[01:28.13]
[01:28.71]迂腐的人前来祝贺 假惺惺
[01:30.28]
[01:31.06]现在知道你在和谁打交道了吧
[01:32.57]
[01:33.61]我只和少数志同道合的人共事
[01:35.13]
[01:36.05]无论输赢 信誉是第一位的
[01:37.90]妈妈说这才是真正的道义
[01:39.68]爱情 让我们来谈谈爱情
[01:42.83]
[01:43.75]这是你唯一渴望的事情吗
[01:47.67]
[01:48.49]我对你很有感觉
[01:50.63]
[01:53.47]我对你很有感觉
[01:55.18]
[01:56.33]//
[01:58.65]也许是这个夜晚 我的梦境让我知道
[02:01.93]满天繁星向我越靠越近 满天繁星向我越靠越近
[02:08.48]也许是这个夜晚 我的梦境让我知道
[02:11.81]满天繁星向我越靠越近 满天繁星向我越靠越近
[02:19.06]全身上下充满了自信
[02:21.33]开始交谈 我变得摇摆不定
[02:25.01]
[02:25.66]无法控制自己 你让我伤心失望
[02:30.59]只是诱惑而已 赶紧离我远一点
[02:32.91]你知道你错了 赶紧离我远一点
[02:35.60]一切都大错特错 赶紧离我远一点
[02:39.01]
[02:39.74]无意义的眼泪 无意义的祈求
[02:44.80]我只是感谢生活 感谢每一天
[02:46.87]感谢分分秒秒 感谢新生
[02:49.67]这一切如何才能让人满意
[02:51.86]感到伤心也只好苟活下去
[02:54.86]还是过好自己的生活吧
[02:56.85]我们的时间已所剩无几
[02:59.04]
[02:59.80]//
[03:00.17]爱情 让我们来谈谈爱情
[03:02.65]这是你唯一渴望的事情吗
[03:04.78]我对你很有感觉
[03:06.13]
[03:09.94]我对你很有感觉
[03:13.84]//
[03:14.49]
[03:18.03]也许是这个夜晚 我的梦境让我知道
[03:21.05]满天繁星向我越靠越近 满天繁星向我越靠越近
[03:27.88]也许是这个夜晚 我的梦境让我知道
[03:30.98]满天繁星向我越靠越近 满天繁星向我越靠越近
